公司簡介: Heyday是第一個為60歲以上的人提供現實生活訓練的互動式力量家庭健身房。力量是改善衰老最重要的訓練。Heydayisthefirstat-homeconnectedfitnessproductforseniorstrengthtraining.Strengthtrainingisthemostimportantworkoutfor60+tolivetheirlifetothefullest.Morethanjustastrengthtrainingmachineforsafetyanddigitalresistance,HeydayisanAIpersonaltrainerthatmotivatesusersthroughouttheirjourney.
